Transportation: The family has a wheelchair accessible van they purchased and typically use for transportation.

SW will complete it with Mom, in addition, to write a letter signed by the MD stating the reason why Lillie will need stretcher transport, as requested in the MATP application. Mom interested in speak with her about what appointments will look like for Lillie without a wheelchair. SW offered to relay this message. Mom shared she will be at the bedside at 3pm. SW will meet with Mom at 3pm and complete a full SW assessment. Addendum 3:30pm: SW met with Mom at the bedside and provided the MATP application. Mom agreed to fill out the application and SW will submit it on behalf of the family via fax. Please see separate SW note for full SW assessment.
